value.stringValue: Sales Notification for equal or less than 20K

rules.name: TRUE_recurring_adjustment_follow_up
rules.conditionLogic: (5 AND 6 AND 7) AND ((1 OR 2 ) OR (3 OR 4 )) OR (7 AND 8 AND 6 AND 5 AND NOT(9) AND NOT(10)) AND 11 AND 12
rules.label: TRUE_recurring adjustment follow up

Flow.description: Added opportunity type as part of BIZ-49086.

formulas.name: AcceptanceDateToday
formulas.expression: TODAY ()

formulas.name: AdvAcceptedFormula
formulas.expression: AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Advance_Accepted__c }), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Advance_Accepted__c }, 'Yes'))

formulas.name: CampaignName
formulas.expression: {!$Record.Campaign.Name}

formulas.name: ClearAdvanceAcceptedtrue
formulas.expression: AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.StageName }), OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName}, 'Pre-funnel'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName}, 'Qualify'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName}, 'Verify') ) )

formulas.name: Date
formulas.expression: NOW()

formulas.name: formula_1_myRule_10_A1_6661340939
formulas.expression: Priorvalue({!$Record.CloseDate })

formulas.name: formula_1_myRule_4_A1_6103619939
formulas.expression: Null

formulas.name: formula_2_myRule_7_A1_4899296448
formulas.expression: NOW()

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_1
formulas.expression:
OR ( AND(ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Intapp"), {!$Record.Sales_Territory__c ="Accounting/Consulting" }),
AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c}), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Intapp"), {!$Record.Sales_Territory__c ="Accounting/Consulting" }) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_10
formulas.expression: OR( AND({!$Record.IsWon =true}, ischanged({!$Record.IsWon}), {!$Record.Record_Type_Text__c="Legal - Cancellation / Recurring Downgrade" }), AND({!$Record.IsWon =true}, ischanged({!$Record.IsWon}), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type},"Legal - Recurring Adjustment" )) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_11
formulas.expression:
OR(
AND( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Intapp"), OR ( {!$Record.Geography__c="South America"}, {!$Record.Geography__c="Unknown geography"})),
AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c}), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"To be determined"), OR ( {!$Record.Geography__c="South America"}, {!$Record.Geography__c="Unknown geography"}))
)

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_11s
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.Type}))), NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.Contract_Signer__c })), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Type}) ), OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Upgrade') ) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_13
formulas.expression:
OR( AND( ISNEW(), OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Partner - Intapp paper"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Partner - Partner paper"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Partner - Intapp paper (blended)"))),
AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c}), OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Partner - Intapp paper"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Partner - Partner paper"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Partner - Intapp paper (blended)"))) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_13s
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.Type}))), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Type}) ), OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - Additional Services'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Services - Partner') ) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_15s
formula_TRUE_myRule_17s
formula_TRUE_myRule_19s
formula_TRUE_myRule_1s
formulas.expression: AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.AccountId})), NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.Account.Primary_Services_Provider__c})) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_21s
formula_TRUE_myRule_23s
formula_TRUE_myRule_25s
formulas.expression: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Type }) ), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type},'Consulting Services – Internal') )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_27s
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.Type}))), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Type}) ), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - Consulting Services'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - New Converted Customer'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - New Converted Product'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - New Customer'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - New Product'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Training'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Intapp Prime'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - Additional Services'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Managed Service'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - Add-on module'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Early Adopter Program'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Services - Partner'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - Recovered Customer'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - Recovered Product'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Upgrade'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - Services Change Request') ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_28
formulas.expression: AND( {!$Record.Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE}, {!$Record.IsWon}, ISCHANGED({!$Record.IsWon}), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName},"Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "Training") )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_283
formulas.expression: AND( {!$Record.Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE}, {!$Record.IsWon}, ISCHANGED({!$Record.IsWon}), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName},"Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "Training") )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_3
formulas.expression:
OR(
AND( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Intapp"), {!$Record.Sales_Territory__c ="NA Legal South/APAC" }),
AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c}), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Intapp"), {!$Record.Sales_Territory__c ="NA Legal South/APAC" })
)

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_30
formulas.expression: AND( {!$Record.Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE}, {!$Record.IsWon}, ISCHANGED({!$Record.IsWon}), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "Legal - Billing Paused/Restarted") )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_304
formulas.expression: AND( {!$Record.Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE}, {!$Record.IsWon}, ISCHANGED({!$Record.IsWon}), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "Legal - Billing Paused/Restarted") )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_32
formulas.expression: AND( {!$Record.Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE}, {!$Record.IsWon}, ISCHANGED({!$Record.IsWon}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.StageName }), {!$Record.Sale_Category__c ="Churn"}, NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type},"ACV Recovery/Partial ACV Reinstatement")) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_326
formulas.expression: AND( {!$Record.Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE}, {!$Record.IsWon}, ISCHANGED({!$Record.IsWon}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.StageName }), {!$Record.Sale_Category__c ="Churn"}, NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type},"ACV Recovery/Partial ACV Reinstatement")) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_34
formulas.expression:
AND( {!$Record.Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE}, {!$Record.IsWon}, ISCHANGED({!$Record.IsWon}), CONTAINS({!$Record.Opp_Product_Lines__c},"Cloud"), OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type},"Cancellation - Customer") , ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type},"Cancellation - Product"))
)

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_347
formulas.expression:
AND( {!$Record.Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE}, {!$Record.IsWon}, ISCHANGED({!$Record.IsWon}), CONTAINS({!$Record.Opp_Product_Lines__c},"Cloud"), OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type},"Cancellation - Customer") , ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type},"Cancellation - Product"))
)

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_3s
formula_TRUE_myRule_4
formulas.expression: AND( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName },'Pre-Funnel'))

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_42
formulas.expression: AND( {!$Record.Concession_Amount__c < 0}, ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), {!$Record.IsClosed = FALSE })

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_4266
formulas.expression: AND( {!$Record.Concession_Amount__c < 0}, ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), {!$Record.IsClosed = FALSE })

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_5
formulas.expression:
OR(
AND( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Intapp"), NOT({!$Record.Geography__c="APAC"}), {!$Record.Sales_Territory__c ="NA Legal North" }),
AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c}), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Intapp"), NOT({!$Record.Geography__c="APAC"}), {!$Record.Sales_Territory__c ="NA Legal North" }) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_5s
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.Type}))), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Type}) ), OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - New Converted Customer'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - New Converted Product'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'New Implementation'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - New Customer'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - New Product'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - Recovered Customer'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Legal - Recovered Product') ) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_7
formulas.expression: OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName },'Qualify'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName },'Verify'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName },'Position'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName },'Propose'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName },'Selected'), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.StageName },'Closed Won') )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_7new
formulas.expression:
OR( AND( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Intapp"), {!$Record.Geography__c="APAC"}, {!$Record.Sales_Territory__c ="NA Legal North" }),
AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c}), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Intapp"), {!$Record.Geography__c="APAC"}, {!$Record.Sales_Territory__c ="NA Legal North" }) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_7s
formula_TRUE_myRule_9
formulas.expression:
OR(
AND( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Intapp"), {!$Record.Sales_Territory__c ="EMEA" }),
AND( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c}), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Fulfilling_Entity__c},"Intapp"), {!$Record.Sales_Territory__c ="EMEA" }) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_9s
formulas.expression: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.Type}))), NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.Intapp_Prime_Contact_1__c})), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!$Record.Type}) ), OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, 'Intapp Prime') ) )

formulas.name: PopulateweeklydealreviewFormula
formulas.expression: '[ ]'&BR() & '-TOP PRIORITY'&BR() & 'TCV'&BR() & 'OH'&BR() & 'OPC'&BR() & '-CONTRACT'&BR() & 'CT'&BR() & 'Bkg Date'&BR() & 'Eff Date'&BR() & 'Sig'&BR() & 'Super by'&BR() & '-ACCOUNT'&BR() & 'AT'&BR() & 'AT1'&BR() & '-OPPORTUNITY'&BR() & 'CDate'&BR()

formulas.name: SaleCategory
